original_text: “Now therefore, if you acted in good faith and integrity when you made Abimelech king, and if you have dealt well with Jerubbaal and his house and have done to him as his deeds deserved—
korean_text: 이제 너희가 아비멜렉을 세워 왕으로 삼았으니 너희가 행한 것이 과연 진실하고 의로우냐 이것이 여룹바알과 그의 집을 선대함이냐 이것이 그의 손이 행한 대로 그에게 보답함이냐

sentences.original_text: if you acted in good faith and integrity
and if you have dealt well with Jerubbaal and his house
sentences.korean_translation: 또 만일 너희가 여룹바알과 그의 집을 선대하였고,

sentences.original_text: and have done to him as his deeds deserved—
